name: Portal Potty
description:
Portal Potty: The Epic of The John
This game is a sidescrolling beat them up where you play as John as he trys to get home to his beloved toilet. Due to 
his poop shy issues, he has no where else to go. 
The fighting includes light and heavy attacks, as well as blocking and movement. With this game, you will have to fight and 
defeat multiple unique enemies and bosses. With the fighting, press left click for a light attack, and right click for heavy
attack, with the block being spacebar. Move using WASD.
There are also three different environments that you will have to travel through to finally get home to your john. Oh, by 
the way, did we say that the main character time travels? Pretty neat huh? You will go through various times
and fight the final boss to attain that epic poop royale. Because everyone knows, home is where the toilet is. 
Credits:
Artists: Noah Bush, Thomas Holsapple, Cobrin Crutcher, Kenneth Fugate
Programmers: Josh Ralls, Mika Nelson
Music: Cobrin Crutcher
Designers: Thomas Holsapple, Josh Ralls, Mika Nelson
Programs Used:
Piskel
Magical Voxel
Unity
BeepBox
Audacity
